name: sgr_underline_color
description: SGR 58;5;N sets underline color (indexed), SGR 58;2;R;G;B sets underline color (RGB), SGR 59 resets underline color
comment: SGR(58;5;160) indexed underline color + SGR(4) underline on, print G. SGR(58;2;0;255;0) RGB underline color, print H. SGR(59) reset underline color, print I.
